news.title: Wholesale prices rose 0.9% in July, much more than expected
news.summary: The producer price index was expected to show a 0.2% increase for July, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate. The consumer price index is expected to rise 0.3% for July.

news.title: Economist Sumerlin confirms he's in the running for Fed chair, backs big interest rate cut
news.summary: Sumerlin: Lowering the Fed's key rate would be an easy decision now. Sumerlin said on CNBC that lowering the Fed’s key rates would be a easy decision.

news.title: Cadillac unveils 'Elevated Velocity' electric crossover concept car
news.summary: Cadillac Elevated Velocity is a new concept car aimed at building on the brand's all-electric luxury crossover segment. General Motors unveiled the concept car at an event in Detroit.

news.title: Kodak faces financial struggles even as Gen Z sparks a film resurgence
news.summary: Film camera company Kodak indicated it may need to file for bankruptcy. But Gen Z is showing a renewed interest in retro tech and aesthetics.

news.title: Google faces loss of Chrome as Perplexity bid adds drama to looming breakup decision
news.summary: Perplexity AI's offer of $34.5 billion for Google's Chrome browser is a lot lower than where some analysts value the business.

news.title: ‘I’m confused!’ Why does President Trump want a rate cut so badly?
news.summary: Moneyist reader raises questions in the aftermath of the latest inflation data. A letter from a worried, wary Moneyist reader raised questions about the inflation figures.

news.title: Warren Buffett has secretly invested $5 billion into a mystery stock — and the trail leads to this industrial giant
news.summary: Buy the stock or an industrial-sector ETF — but get ahead of Berkshire Hathaway’s big reveal. The company is expected to announce a major shake-up in the near future.

news.title: Millennial and Gen Z customers are flocking to Coach. So why is Tapestry’s stock tanking?
news.summary: Tapestry shares fall sharply after results from the Coach and Kate Spade parent weren't good enough to justify another record high. Shares of fashion-brand company Tapestry were falling sharply.

news.title: Wholesale prices post biggest surge in three years, PPI shows, in sign of tariff-related inflation
news.summary: The cost of wholesale goods and services posted the biggest increase in July in three years. The increase could herald a sizable acceleration in price increases tied to higher U.S. tariffs.

news.title: Clash of the titans: The hottest momentum stock meets the most notorious short seller
news.summary: Palantir is the best gainer this year in the S&P 500. Andrew Left says he is shorting Palantir.
